participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Ethan is an outgoing and adventurous individual who enjoys luxury items and socializing.
participant_1.background: I like to spend my money on cars. I have never had a steady relationship. I watch too much TV in my spare time. I go to the gym most days just to socialize. I work from home.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Sophie is a cheerful and sociable person who loves to celebrate special moments with friends and has a passion for teaching.
participant_2.background: My favorite singer is Taylor Swift. I love eating out with friends. I'm getting married in the spring. I work at a school as a kindergarten teacher. I'm 24 years old.
